Quickstrike:





Quickstrike opened his optics to see Megatron before him. He 
immediately closed them quickly, with a pain behind his optics. He 
grimaced.

"T' be honest," he said. "Ah feel like--" He opened his optics again. 
Megatron. He frowned, then looked around. He wasn't in the base. "How 
ah get here?" with a sharp tone. Despite being repaired in the CR 
tank, something still wasn't quite right.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron shook his head. "Actually, I think talking to him 
over 
> communications would be better. Were a little steamed right now and 
I wouldnt 
> want you or Rampage to acidentally kill one of the Rebels." And 
then 
> proceeded over to the communications array.
>        "Contact Killfest and talk about our main focus...The 
Maximals and 
> Allience. We are not taking about alligning or a peace treaty. I am 
not going 
> to help them, and I know they wont help us. Discuss with him the 
main agenda, 
> and that by fuding with ourselfs wont get us anywhere." And then 
continued, 
> "If I talk to him it would just anger him, and besides, Im far to 
furious at 
> him at the moment. Got that? Yes."
>        Turning on his heel he came over to Quickstrike, "And how 
are you 
> feeling?"
> 
>        Hell Beast and Gremlin rested for a moment on the banks of a 
large 
> lake. It was surrounded by trees on all sides, and across from them 
they 
> could see a small human village and a few fishing ships in the 
lake. He 
> assumed this was thier main hunting and gathering grounds. A long 
time ago he 
> would have captured them and pumped them full of liquid energon, 
made them 
> into soldiers to crush his foes. But that was a long time ago....
>        "So, are we leaving or not?" Gremlin said, still confused on 
the 
> situation.
>        Hel lBeast didnt think the split between the Predacons was 
wise, after 
> all, now they were just going to war agianst each other. Meantime, 
the 
> Maximals would get back on thier feet and the Allience would 
continue its 
> expanse. The diplomat needed a group he could trust.
>        "Personally, I dont know. Megatron is a marked bot, 
Killfest's team is 
> a group of Rebels who wont attack the Maximals or Allience. For 
now, Gremlin, 
> it looks like were stuck on this rock. " He shighed. If Megatron 
would allign 
> with another group....then mabey he could make up his mind. In the 
mean time, 
> he just wanted to sit in the calmness of the surrounding beauty.
